Key Match Events: The Lakers were thoroughly outplayed by the hosts at the Little Ceasar's Arena as the likes of Jaden Ivey and Tim Hardaway Jr. put the screws on LA to hand them a 12-point defeat
Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick described the mood in the Lakers locker room as 'all disappointed' after the grim loss to the Pistons
JJ Redick called for the Lakers to shore up their defensive efforts saying 'We need to start the game with a little more pride defensively'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers defense has taken a hit this season, with the fourth-worst defensive rating in the league at 117.8
The Lakers are 1-3 on the road trip so far
Others: Anthony Davis scored 37 points and LeBron James had 20 points with 11 assists
The Lakers will depend on Cam Reddish, Max Christie, and Jaxson Hayes to add more teeth on defense
